statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT id, transportation_mode, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT transportation_mode, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT id, transportation_mode, distance, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE transportation_mode = 'Train';
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance > 100 AND cost < 500 ORDER BY cost DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transportation_mode, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT id, transportation_mode, distance, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost > 300 ORDER BY transportation_mode ASC
SELECT transportation_mode, AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY transportation_mode HAVING AVG(cost) > 200
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM transportation_costs
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000 ORDER BY cost_id DESC;
SELECT transport_mode, cost_amount FROM transportation_costs WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT date_expense, cost_amount, transport_mode FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE suggested_method LIKE '%reduce%';
SELECT opportunity_id, saving_area FROM cost_saving_opportunities ORDER BY potential_savings ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost_amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_expense DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transport_mode, SUM(cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY transport_mode HAVING total_cost > 5000;
SELECT route_id, AVG(cost_amount) AS avg_cost FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY route_id ORDER BY avg_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE transport_mode = 'Ship' AND date_expense BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY route_id HAVING num_records >= 3 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_transportation_costs;
SELECT transportation_mode, transportation_cost FROM historical_transportation_costs WHERE transportation_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_opportunities ORDER BY saving_estimation DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type='Highway' ORDER BY route_distance ASC;
SELECT id, cost_saving_strategy FROM cost_saving_opportunities LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_transportation_costs WHERE transportation_mode = 'Train';
SELECT route_name, route_type, route_distance FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'Highway' ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT id, cost_saving_strategy, saving_estimation FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE saving_estimation > 5000;
SELECT id, transportation_mode, transportation_cost FROM historical_transportation_costs WHERE transportation_cost < 1000 ORDER BY transportation_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'Air' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT id, date, cost FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT description FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT route_name, distance, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance < 500;
SELECT mode_name, description FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY mode_name ASC;
SELECT id, date, cost, description FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, route_name, distance FROM transportation_routes WHERE distance < 500 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, mode_name, description FROM transportation_modes WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT id, provider_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM transportation_providers WHERE provider_name LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A'
SELECT * FROM historical_transportation_costs;
SELECT route_name, cost FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE potential_savings > 5000.00;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT transport_mode, description FROM transportation_modes WHERE id = 3;
SELECT route_name, cost, date FROM historical_data WHERE cost >= 1000.00 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_transportation_costs WHERE cost > 1000
SELECT route_name, cost FROM historical_transportation_costs ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT route_name, transport_mode, distance, cost FROM historical_transportation_costs WHERE distance BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE ending_location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT route_name, transport_mode, cost, date FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY cost
